hadi.name: Hadi Chaaban
hadi.about: I'm an aspiring software developer from Detroit, Michigan. In my spare time, I enjoy playing video games and making electronics.

experience.title: Software Developer Itern
experience.info:
Developed performant, scalable and highly available applications using Kotlin, Docker, Apache Ignite
Managed infrastructure using Terraform, Jenkins, and Ansible.
Implemented delta query APIs resulting in a 99% decrease in payload and a 32-71% decrease in latency

experience.title: Software Developer Itern

projects.title: Formica
projects.description: An in-discord form service that allows you to fill in forms via a discord bot. You can create and manage forms, as well as manage your responses via a web interface.

projects.title: Don't Fear the Reaper!
projects.description: A 2D hide n' seek game, where you can play as the grim reaper where the objective is to hunt down the TBD (To Be Deceased). Or, you can play as the TBD, with a goal of escaping the reaper's catacombs before he finds you.

projects.title: The Education Game
projects.description: An educational game for children with autism, intended to improve their development in 3 skill areas: arithmetic, emotion recognition, and fine motor skills.
